name: CyberBlitz
description:
I made this game with my team at northwest vista college. To see testers check in-game credits.

This game was in development for about a year. it was nominated for the E3 student game submission by our school.

----------About the game---------------------

Cyber Blitz is the hyper futuristic evolution of dodgeball where getting hit means losing your life.  Two teams of Robots are pitted against each other in fast paced matches. These battles  become even more intense through the inclusion of special balls that shake up gameplay with  their unique and devastating effects. Battle in beautiful in environments, each with their own  hazards to keep the player on their toes! Join up to 3 friends and compete to see which team is  superior.
